about.text: Hello, I'm Gui Farias, 22 years old and graduated in Systems Analysis and Development from Impacta college. I'm passionate about technology and its innovative capacity. I have over 5 years of experience as a web developer.
about.text2: In addition to programming, I love to create. When I'm not on the computer, I'm creating RPG adventures, drawing, or turning those drawings into code. I also love going for bike or skateboard rides.

service.title: Services/skills
service.text: I am an experienced web developer with over 5 years of experience and several websites completed and online.
service.text2: I possess solid skills in HTML, CSS (Scss, Bootstrap, Tailwind), JS ES6 (Jquery, React, Svelte), PHP (Wordpress), as well as advanced knowledge in UI/UX, SEO rules, analytics, and WCAG (accessibility).

contact.title: Contact
contact.subTitle: Send an Email
contact.text: If you have a company or business and are looking to develop a website or application to leverage it, a job proposal, or even suggestions or criticism, please contact me through this form. I would be happy to respond!

dani.text: Mental health is very important and something we all need, this site is the first step for you to schedule a conversation with psychologist Daniela Alves.

cord.text: For those looking to rent trucks and machinery for their construction project, Cordeiro Locações offers great prices with a variety of models and options.

live.text: During my work with Live Incentive, a promotion and incentive agency, I was able to develop their website showcasing great success stories and information about the agency.
